name: BerksCountyFamilyFun
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Macaroni Kid Reading is a free weekly e-newsletter and website that highlights fun things for families to do in and around Berks County, Pennsylvania. We have made it even easier to stay current on local family fun with this Alexa Briefing that you can check each week to find fun things for your family to do in our community.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
